value.title: Fuzzy Grouping in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: I have explained previously what fuzzy matching in Power BI is and how to use it. In this article and video, I’ll explain Fuzzy grouping. Fuzzy grouping in short means grouping text values by their similarity based on a threshold, rather than exact equal values. This option at the moment is available

value.title: Get the List of FOLDERS only in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: There are times that you need to get the list of FOLDERS and not just files. Of course folder itself (without considering files in it), doesn't contain data to be used for a report. value.title: How to Change Joining Types in Power BI and Power Query

value.title: Microsoft Power BI: Unleash row level security patterns in Power BI - THR3015
value.excerpt: Security is different from sharing; sharing is about sharing the entire content with others—security is about authorizing different views of the content to others.
